name: Russian Chicken Stew with Potatoes and Vegetables
author: nt_bella
summary: This quick and easy chicken dish, loaded with potatoes and vegetables takes less than 1 hour to cook and tastes great with rice or noodles.
ingredients: 1 ¼ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast, cubed
salt and freshly ground black pepper
directions: Melt butter in a large saucepan over medium heat
Add chicken and brown on all sides, about 5 minutes
Add potatoes, carrot, and onion; cook and stir until vegetables begin to soften, 6 to 8 minutes
Stir tomato paste into the saucepan and season with salt and pepper
Pour enough water to cover and continue to simmer until chicken is no longer pink in the center and vegetables are tender, about 15 minutes
